title: Siren Detection (Studio Accelerator)
description: Use a microphone to detect if you have an emergency vehicle siren in the vicinity
long_description: This Studio Accelerator allows you to build an emergency vehicle siren detector that can be used on any supported (Infineon) MCU with a microphone. This model is suitable for applications with wearables, in automotive use-cases and safety monitoring.
